p: Zika virus Puerto Rico strain PRVABC59 was used for the challenge (0.5â€‰mL containing a nominal dose of 10 4 ffu). The seed stock was passaged three times on Vero cells at CDC, Fort Collins, Colorado. Virus stocks were prepared by passaging two times on C6/36 mosquito cells. Stocks were from a master working virus bank and tested for sterility, mycoplasma and endotoxin prior to use.
